repos_data.description: Redisson - Easy Redis Java client and Real-Time Data Platform. Valkey compatible. Sync/Async/RxJava/Reactive API. Over 50 Redis based Java objects and services: Set, Multimap, SortedSet, Map, List, Queue, Deque, Semaphore, Lock, AtomicLong, Map Reduce, Bloom filter, Spring Cache, Tomcat, Scheduler, JCache API, Hibernate, RPC, local cache ...

Redisson - Easy Redis Java client and Real-Time Data Platform. Valkey compatible. Sync/Async/RxJava/Reactive API. Over 50 Redis based Java objects and services: Set, Multimap, SortedSet, Map, List, Queue, Deque, Semaphore, Lock, AtomicLong, Map Reduce, Bloom filter, Spring Cache, Tomcat, Scheduler, JCache API, Hibernate, RPC, local cache ...
Scientific workflow engine designed for simplicity & scalability. Trivially transition between one off use cases to massive scale production environments
